description: This Navratna Haaram is not just jewelry; it's an heirloom. The use of genuine gemstones and the meticulous Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures both beauty and durability. The Navratna setting carries significant cultural value and is believed to bring good fortune. A true statement piece that blends tradition with luxury.
